alert.note: Alert for Polk; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 4:25PM CDT until July 03 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern St. Croix County in west central Wisconsin... South central Polk County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 424 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Richmond, or 20 miles north of River Falls, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Star Prairie around 435 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
